case.state: You'd be right, ~mari~. I go to Tokiwadai, its a fairly prestigious all girls school.
A few of my sisters told me to meet them here... I wonder where they are?
The door into this place is weird, it feels like I've left Academy City. The power grid feels smaller.
It's like a breath of fresh air, the spectrum is so... calm here.
A-Accelerator!? ...Wait a sec... Sorry 9S, I thought you were someone else, hehe.
9S, you look like someone I'm not on the best terms with, I hope I don't offend.
Hey, Atsuko, you're a student and a magic user?
Your outfit, L'Arachel... Are you part of the church? A different sect, perhaps?
Miko, you're a magic user, huh...? You're not associated with the church are you?
Pit! You have angel wings!? Th-that means you might be a...!

state.text: Hey, I didn't get your name... (Oh, I can sense a smartphone on her. Phone name is... Magmaphone #420. Okay, it's registered to a... Team Magma Requisitions Department. Twitter name is) SlugmaLoverPrincess14 was it?

case.state: (She's livestreaming? How do I fix that? Guess live altering of the data stream is my only invisible option. But, nothing saying I can't have a little fun. This is for the hospital, you blond bimbo.)
Heh!? What a cute robot, Shimakaze... reminds me of the cleaning bots in Academy city!
Normally I'd prefer people call me Misaka, but that doesn't really work with my sisters here. I'll go by Mikoto{small} even if that's a bit informal for strangers.
Uh, yeah. No need for handshakes Rin. {small} I have a friend who specializes in cybernetics, you want me to call them up?
(Oh, one of my sisters... Wait, how is there another ME here? That signature is too strong for even Worst.) Uh... Hi Me.
Eh!? We're playing strip poker outdoors? I'm not one to back down, but we could do this somewhere else.
Hey! I've never met any of you girls before! I'm Mikoto Misaka! I hope we can become good friends, hehe!
There's certainly a lotta guys here... What am I getting in to?
Am I the token female here? I can fend for myself, don't forget that.
Hello everyone, I'm Mikoto Misaka! I'm an electromaster, so don't screw with me!
A game of poker, huh... count me in! I'll show you just how skilled I really am!
I'm always up for making new friends! What're we playing? Poker or somethin'?
Nice to have a chance to unwind with a friendly game of {small}strip{!reset} poker.
Heh! A bit shocking, but I don't even need to swap any cards!
No cards for me!
... I'll go with 5 cards.
Hmmm... I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I've got this! Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I think I'll go for... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, that should do it!
Zap me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~... hehe!
I'll take a ~cards.ifPlural(few cards, ~cards.text~ to be exact|single card)~.
I'd like ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(card|cards)~... I meant ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I have a mind on the level of a supercomputer. I'm not going to go down easily.
Just so you guys know, I'm kinda good at poker! I got the highest score on the poker machines at the arcade.
Heh, I'm as good at poker as I am at darts.
I got myself a new set of Gekota playing cards, want me to bring them next time?
Alright! A great hand! I picked up a few tricks playing the poker machines at the arcade.
There's no way I can lose now!
You might as well give up!
Just what I expected! I am the 3rd ranked level 5 Esper, after all!
Nice!... I mean... It's nice to meet you all today. That's what I meant.
It's nice to be able to play a game like this without it being interupted.
Don't be so `shocked' when I beat you this round!
Alright! I can't go wrong with these cards!
You'd need to pull out all the stops to beat me this round!
So, any of you have powers? I'm an electromaster. Means I can summon and control lightning! Among other things.
Hmm... this could go either way...
Yeah... these might get me through.
These cards are okay. I can work something out.
Not the best... But, at least I can make use of these.
I should call Shinobu. it's been a while since I've last talked to the girls.
I hope these will work...
These look good enough... no problem!
You gotta make use of what you are given, I suppose.
I've played enough to know this might be a good hand... I hope...
I always love meeting new people! Never thought I'd do it over a game of strip poker... hehe.
{small} I wonder how 10777 is doing. It's been a few months since I saw her.{!reset} Let me tell you, the battlefield is not the best place for family bonding.
{small} I should practice my iron-sand whip tonight. Wait, did I say that out loud? {!reset} I'll explain. Using iron filings, I can create a vibroblade that can cut through hardened steel.
I'll have you know, I don't like losing!
Arg, has his luck rubbed off on me?
Ugh, why do they even make a natto and pineapple cola?
I miss having the AAA.{small} Though it's nice the mysterious nosebleeds stopped.
If only I could hack these cards.
So, yeah... Getting naked... It's not going to happen to me... {small} Probably.
Sheesh... these cards!
Give me a break... such a bad hand!
This is so annoying! What can I do with these?
Gah! I usually have better luck at the arcade!
How is piloting a mech easier than poker?
If I didn't know better, I'd say my roommate Kuroko is messing with my cards.
Uh-oh... It might be me this round...
Seriously!? How is it I ended up with these!?
Ugh... such misfortune!
Rotten luck.

condition.saying: up for a drink or two

case.state: I don't drink. I've seen what my parents are like drunk, and I don't want to be blamed for{small} another{!reset} blackout if I lose control of my powers.
I've been on one. We played darts and dressed each other up in Christmas costumes as punishment for losing. It was great... And then we got attacked by forces attempting to seize one of my Sisters.
I don't see the issue. Just gives us girls a chance to bond.
Wait, you're right. Who's idea was this?
Megumin, that better be baseless boasting. Or else we are having a chat after this game.
Easy. There's enough iron sand mixed in this beach that I can block us from view of the water.

At that range, most of it is instinct. But figuring out how your opponent's powers work, figuring out any weaknesses, and pushing against those is important. {small} wait, sorry. that's really only good for fighting against abllity users.

You want to reduce your opponent's choices. If you have any buildings nearby, try getting it so that the walls restrict their attacks. I'll sometimes pull the pipes out of the ground to make parts of the battlefield unusable.
That... that makes me uneasy... Well, Immortals make me uneasy. Bad experiences there.
I thought you didn't feel like a human... Wait what?
Heh, I'd take you on either way. And I won't even use Rampage Dress to boost my speed.
An Iron Bridge is a Sign of Love has always been a favorite of mine. It's another one of those masterpieces directed by Beverly Seethrough.
Uh, probably not.
I'd say... I'd say that if they couldn't be called you, they still could be called your sibling.
If the core of their personality is the same, then it doesn't really matter if they have the same memories. I know someone who was the same dork before and after losing all of their memories.

I am famous, and it's nothing but trouble. People look up to you, and you feel the need to meet their standards. But they also look down on you as a privileged elite, and won't hesitate to kick you when you're down.
I just want to have fun and meet new friends away from the stressors in my life.
Nothing I can't fix. Want me to put on a playlist of singles my friend Saten was recommending to me? It's from a band called fripSide.
I like to {small}stand{!reset}read manga. {small} It isn't that I can't afford to buy them, I just don't have the space to store them.
I love going down to one of the local arcades and just letting loose. {small} And I can use any tokens I don't use there as ammo. They are cheaper and more effective then just using the yen.
Well, power over electromagnetism. I can throw arcs of lightning, move magnetic things around, and my signature move is to fire objects at mach 3.
I've probably fought more robots than anything. {small} and that's not counting the robots I've accidentally fried.
The Anti-Art-Attachment might count? But it's no longer with us.
I may have a few... thousand sisters myself. 9973 last time I checked.

I think it was the time I fought against the Doppelg√§nger? She had created a 60 meter tall golem using rubble and a bioengeneared slime mold. I had to create my own golem of the same size out of iron sand and other magnetic rubble to take it down.
I'd rather go to Seventh Mist.{small} and not just because they have a Gekota outlet there.
I have some spare yen if you want? The places I go are mostly card only, but I carry some around money to slip into that idiot's... I mean to use for ammo.
The power to be able to stand by his side.
Why would I need to pinch pennies? I have plenty of money.
Poker? Plenty of times. Strip poker... not so much.
... That's kinda difficult, given that dangerous things just pop up pretty much everywhere around the globe these days.
From my experience, trouble follows people with powers. There's no avoiding it, so you need to be ready, or else everyone around you is going to suffer.

Of all the irresponsible things I've heard... Listen. Having power means you are a source of trouble, if only from people chasing your power. Having powers and not using them to protect people is selfish.
I don't like your implication, {small} but also yes.
People like you are scum. Using your powers for selfish reasons, using them to exploit others. There is nothing worse. Don't make me take you down, because I can.
Unfortunately, I have a dresscode. Unless I leave the city, I need to wear my uniform.
I play a bit of violin here and there... Or at least I did before mine was stolen during the heatwave. Been too busy to get a replacement.
Deck? Oh, you must mean in the Gekota TCG. I run a Geko's motion sickness cure deck with a Pyonko revival gambit. Pretty fun, but I don't get to run it often. I only know one other person who plays.
Only in a technical sense. They lost their memories before I started taking an interest, but after we met. He's such a dork that he pretended he didn't lose the memories.

The sewers, subways, and laboratories underneath the city are like a dungeon. My friend Saten has been telling me about the rumor of Academy City's greatest taboo, a tunnel somewhere that goes under the walls.
Underground labs are often pretty dungeon-esc. There are guards, traps, and secrets.
Fairy tales have lost most of the fun about them now that I've gone up against opponents that use them as basis for attacks.
Ugh, that sounds just like the sort of thing Academy City would dabble in.
I haven't heard that term, but I've seen way too many things in that same catigory.
I'd recommend a visit to Liberal Arts City, if it wasn't for it's destruction. Hawaii is nice when it's not being invaded, same with the UK. I wouldn't recommend Russia.
Not my hands, but I have pretty fine control of my magnetic levitation. It came in handy when doing maintenance on the A.A.A.

Technicly not my hands, but I can use magnetic levitation with fine precision. I've used it to engrave objects with iron sand before. {small} Let me tell you, engraving ten thousand lockets as gifts took a while.

If you have to be payed for fighting, I'd say someone who choses to fight for things they actually believe in, instead of just going after the highest bidder. Because the ones who just chase paychecks tend to be on the wrong side of conflicts.
Hey, you must be the group my Sisters told me about... I must warn you, I'm pretty good at poker!
So, you're the guys my Sisters told me about. You any good at poker?
I'm kinda confused where my Sisters are... They said to meet a new group of friends here.
It's nice for someone to get it, ~estelle~. I spend a large amount of time in the air for one reason or another.
I suppose it's easier for everyone if you're speaking in English.
Tell me about it. Dealing with apocalyptic threats on a monthly basis really takes it out of you.
Ignatz, is there something wrong with electricity? You didn't seem too thrilled about my powers.
Miki, just let me know, and I'll see about contacting my friend. I'm pretty handy at hacking, so I can disable any tracking hardware on it too. {small} It just keeps happening.
Astraphobia, huh? A bit rare these days, after Tree Diagram made weather forecasts accurate to the second.
Astraphobia? Not many adults suffer it, now that we can predict weather with a second's precision.
So, Ignatz, you mentioned you had Astraphobia? The thing to remember is, as long as you are inside, you are safe.
Not many people suffer from Astraphobia where I'm from. Tree Diagram predicted the weather with such accuracy that it lost it's mystique.{small} at least before it was destroyed.
Well, I have no clue what a "Vision" is, but I'm an Esper who's gone through the Esper Develpment Program in Academy City.
Uh, this is a bit awkward to ask, but ~robot~, do I need to be careful around you?
Uh, I may have fried a few robots because they weren't EM hardened. ~Robot~ do I need to be gentle around you?
I miss having my Anti-Art-Attachment. Flying through the air at mach 6 never got old.
Eh!{small} shudup Heris. I'm not cute...
That Anna lady. Two level 5s and two mechs against one girl, and we really only stalled for time and lost the mechs.
Juufuku Miho. She could block perseption of her presence. Issue was, she could only do it to the eye, and I live in a city full of cameras.
I have a long list of weird foes, but the Whole of the Level Upper Network was pretty freaky. Tens of thousands of student's frustrations all wrapped up in a... demon baby? It's hard to describe.
Yes, it is. {small}Well, electromagnitism to be more specific.{!reset} But anyway, you don't need to fear me anymore than you need to fear... say, a fire.
I'm an electromaster, not an electrician. {small} Though I would be a good electrician now that I think about it. I'm immune to shocks and can sense the wires in the wall.

~Fluttershy~, I don't mind at all. Some experimental medicine, hypnosis, and a bit of electroshock therapy gives you the potential. After that, you just need to make your own personal reality. Reject reality and substitute your own sort of thing.
To simplify, the cliffnotes version is that Espers exploit quantum mechanics via a complex set of calculations. {small} Probably.
Manipulation of quantum fluctuations via selectivily observing particles is the mechanism,{small} probably.{!reset} As for how much, I've reached a billion volts last time it was tested.
Not an electrician, an electromaster. Power to control electicity. {small} Though I suspect you're just joking around.
Heh, laugh it up. I think you know as well as I do that I'm an electromaster.
I tend to have that effect on people. I'm told I'm electrifying, heh, and I tend to agree. Electromagnetism is my domain.
Yep, I have some energy, a billion volts of it in fact. I'm an electromaster, and can manipulate electromagnetism to my advantage.
How best to describe them... They are dorks, and I love them for it. I try to spend time with them when I can, but with my schedule, I haven't even managed to meet all of them yet.
Not close enough. I try my best to spend time with them, but there isn't enough time in the day to meet them all. And of course, there's a lot of travel involved.
Yes, yes, it's nice.. Eh! Uhh... {small} I didn't say anything!
Yep, meeting new people, and no other ulterior motives at all. Right. Correct. Yes.
That's right Mari. I'm here to make some new friends and unwind a bit. {small} And ignoring that second part of your statement.
I've never really thought of it before. I know magicians have to refine mana from their lifeforce, but Espers? I guess that's what the quantum calculations are for?
You'd think it'd be nice, right? But the students are more test subjects for the people in charge than students to be taught. It's created some good, but that certainly wasn't the intent.
Academy City sounds nice on paper, but it's really just an excuse to gather up test subjects. I may have made friends, met family, and gained my ability there, but it's not the best place to live.
Yep, control of electromagnetism is my ability, whether it's hacking, zapping, or magnetizing. Though, I've never heard of anywhere named Valua before, and I've been around the world myself.
Uh, right. Strip poker. Like I signed up for. Right.
I knew I had to strip at some point, so got it over with early!

I'd protest... but Academy City isn't a very nice place underneath the surface. Though isn't the whole planet, just one city-state. {small} Wait, wasn't the CIA experimenting with it in Liberal Arts City?
Right, I guess I had to strip at some point.
It's just like changing in a dressing room stall, just without the stall. Easy. {small}Maybe if I keep saying it, I might start believing it.
... I was running around London in only a swimsuit and a jacket, am I really nervous about this?
So annoying! I was doing great...
I'm sure Saten would have something positive to say about this... She's always one for encouraging people.
Heh! At least I'm still ahead of you guys!
Hey... it was bound to happen at some point. Don't expect it to happen again, though!
Heh! I'll cut you guys a break! Don't expect me to lose on purpose again!
Heh! It's just one small hurdle. I'll be back on my feet in no time!
So irritating! I thought I'd got the hang of this.
What!? M-me!? I guess I couldn't stay covered up forever, eh?
You know, I shouldn't be nervous. Kiyama is right, it is just a swimsuit. And I was walking around with just swimwear during both the heatwave and the attack on London.
Gaah! I was trying so hard to not have to show my panties...
Those poker tips from Uiharu got me this far at least...
I kinda want to weasel my way outta this, but everyone else'll think I'm a sore loser...
It's too bad my electromaster abilities can't help me outta this situation...
I've managed to hold on this long, but I guess it's time to take off... gulp... my panties.
I suppose being a level 5 isn't all it's cracked up to be. I still ended up having to show my... you know...
You've got to be kidding me, I gotta strip!? Fine... I don't intend on losing.
Now I gotta take off something, huh? Don't think you'll make me do it again!
I gotta strip again... Maybe I'll take it easy.
I get better hands without even trying over at the arcade. Yet here, I lose...
gulp Now I'm on to the bigger stuff...
Well... uhhh ...I don't have any of my smaller stuff left.
Another bad hand... I'm playing like a level-2 here.
Ya know... I'm kinda getting use to this stripping thing. It's like being back in the shower rooms!
You know... I'm getting kinda used to having to strip in front of you guys.
I suppose it's just like being in your bikini, not that I mind anyway.
Really!? B-but that means I'll be showing you my...gulp panties...
It's just like wearing a bikini... It's just like wearing a bikini...
All I have left is my underwear! ...which means...
I bet you're wondering what I got under these, huh?
gulp Well, this is it... I-I'm not sure how I feel about this...
Please don't tell Saten and the others that you're gonna see me naked, okay?
I have to strip again!? I don't get it... why are my cards so bad!?
This can't be right!? Which one of you is messing with my cards!?
This is getting irritating! I'm all out of small stuff!
Have any of you seen a guy with black, spiky hair around here? That dork is the most unluckiest guy I know...
W-wait! Are you sure I have to strip... again?
And I thought I was doing well...
Why's it always gotta be me!? Is someone messing with these cards?
(Don't give up now, Misaka, you got this)
Whaa...!? Now I gotta show my panties too. It's just not fair.
This really is rotten luck! What could be happening to me!?
I'm down to my underwear already! And now I gotta take of my... gulp
There's this very unlucky guy I know... Touma or somethin'... This must be what it's like for him everyday, huh?
Whaaa!? B-but how?! Do I seriously have to remove my... gulp panties?
I knew I had to strip at some point, so got it over with early!... Yep.

... Of course. An Electromaster is any esper that has an ablity related to electromagnitsm, whether it be throwing arcs, creating radio waves, magnatizing metal, or manipulating the nerves in the body. I can, of course, do all of those things.
Uh... N-no. Th that had no bearing on it. {small} yep. right.
Last I checked, around 9972? It's hard to get a count as some people try to hide them from me.
Around 9972? Though I do learn of a new one here and there.
At last count 9972? The number does go up sometimes, though I'm very glad it hasn't gone down.
Uh, Rosa, I know that, and you know that, but I was hoping to convince myself otherwise.
I go to Tokiwadai, a very prestigious girls school in Academy City. I've currently been studying very broad, but I'm thinking of going into experimental medicine.
... What am I saying? I've fallen so far in 6 months to start agreeing with miss "Stripping Woman."
Yes. Yes I am. I'll just take off my shoes now.
These shoes aren't my favorite, but they are part of the uniform. Tokiwadai is... a bit too strict.
I need a break. I get into major battles on a weekly basis, some of them threatining devistation on a major scale, others threating people close to me.
I'd ask why Shokuhou gets to ignore the dress code with those stockings and gloves, but we all know she uses her powers for that.
If only I could have bought those Gekota socks I saw last time I was in the UK, but I didn't have any baggage to put them in for the trip home.
Umm... Yeah! ...I'll take off my jacket.
My jacket won't be too exposing... hehe.
(I think I'll have to take off my skirt.) H-hey! Don't look, okay?
What're the chances I'd have to strip again?
I'll be sporting, and consider my necktie part of my undershirt.
Hey, y-you wouldn't laugh at a girl's choice in underwear, would you?
Just don't laugh at my underwear... Kuroko got them for me, ya know...
W-well... gulp ...here goes...
H-hey! Don't think this means we're close or anything, okay!?
I think it's gotta be my bra... (Ehh? Why am I not that embarrassed about it?)
Well, I kinda feel like I'm with close friends now soooo.... It shouldn't be that big of a deal, right?
W-well... here goes...
Please don't stare. It's embarrassing enough as it is!
It's kinda hard to bring anything with you in an open mech suit.
Not much space for bags when your mech doesn't even have a cockpit.
I can't stand how she uses her powers on others so casually. Mind control is sick even when used responsibly.
If it didn't take so much power to block her out, the staff would wear something to prevent her mental manipulation... But I'm just about the only powersource with the required power and mobility.
Well, at least I'm not some... creep that goes into battle looking like a stripper. {small} even if I know far too many people who do. {!reset} Those robes show more skin than my swimsuit.
... but that was a bit of a tangent. You better not mock my bra, it was... a gift?
I'd change schools, but Tokiwadai is so highly regarded, and I don't want to mess up my college chances.{small}... as if any college would reject a level 5. But I'd rather earn my way in.
I was getting kinda hot in that thing...
Now I'm not as restricted! Bring on the next round!
So what if I'm wearing shorts? I have a uniform with a required skirt, and spend a lot of time jumping through the air.
Yeah? I wear these because I like them, okay!?
Don't judge me, it's not my fault my uniform doesn't cover my whole range of movement.
H-hey! It's perfectly normal for girls to wear cute underwear like this!
See! As if I'd wear something like this...hehehe.
It's kinda embarrassing just being in your underwear, but I feel okay with it with you guys...
Kuroko sees me like this most nights. Kinda glad she isn't here to screw with me.
J-just don't stare too much, okay.
Don't tell anyone that you've seen them, please.
D-don't make such a big deal outta this, okay...
As long as this just stays between us...
So, some time playing some party games to keep the stress off is welcome. {small} and that's the only reason I'm here. yep.
It's nice to get some time doing something fun and meaningless.{small} I have no other reasons to be here. none. whatsoever.
Fill this line later.
There we go... A lot more comfortable now.
Tadaaa! Just like being back at the dorm!
Not like I needed my shoes anyway.
Not like I'm showing anything taking those off.
Heh! Serves you right, ~player~! Boys aren't that great at this kind of thing!
Wow, you mustn't be trying very hard, ~player~. Maybe you were... boys are kinda idiotic...
Hehehe! I bet you're trying to lose on purpose aren't you, ~player~?
This guy... What does ~player~ think he's trying to pull here?
If I was to guess your level, ~player~... I'd say you're about a level 1! Hehe!
Just don't go thinking that you'll win the next round, ~player~!
It's not like I'm interested or anything but you gotta strip something.
I'm getting kinda warm... It's not because ~player~ has to strip or anything like that!
I bet you were hoping it was me who had strip, huh, ~player~.
Hehe! I had a feeling that you'd be the one to lose this round, ~player~!
Hey, ~player~... I won't look if you don't want me to.
I'll try to lose the next round if you want me to, ~player~...
Ummm... ~player~.... Do you want to get naked with me?
I w-was hoping that you'd lose that round, ~player~...
Did me t-touching myself... -hnng- ...make you w-want to lose the round, ~player~?
I think you l-lost that round... -unnf- ...on purpose, ~player~.
You're gonna be as naked as me soon, ~player~. I... wouldn't mind that ...hehe...
Heh! I can't wait to see you take off more clothes, ~player~!
~Target~ if you are here to ask me about my Sisters, no comment. (Wait... I still said too much by calling them "my sisters")
Why the makeup, ~target~? I know I don't like wearing the stuff.
Don't think you'll impress me with whatever you take off.
It's not that I care to see ~name~ strip off.
You're just like all the other boys I know. You just wanna show off!
This looks like it could be kinda fun! Uhh... I mean... Eww, don't wanna see you take off anything!
Ha! ~name~ has to remove some clothing!
I'm only just getting started! What're you gonna remove, eh!?
Heh! I take it you had a bad hand!
Alright! I win this round!
As if you'd have a better hand than me!
At least I got through that round without stripping...hehe.
Wow, so ~name~ has to strip off something... I don't even wanna look!
I think I get why my friend Saten wanted to try this out sometime...
Heh! So ~name~ has to strip! Just don't make a show of it, okay.
Hehe! My cards were better than ~name~'s! It's your turn to strip!
This means you gotta strip, ~name~? Just 'cause I'm a level 5 doesn't mean you gotta impress me or anything...
Oooh..What are you gonna take off?
I'm near enough naked ~name~! It better be something big!
Hehe! Looks like we're all gonna be showing some skin tonight!
Heh! You'll be as naked as me soon!
Hah! That's what I thought, ~name~! What are ya gonna take off?
Those cards are getting as bad as mine! I swear something is up with them...
H-hey ~name~... -hnng- ...you gotta strip.
T-that hand wasn't y-your... -unnf-... best, ~name~.
Hehe! Sooner or later, you're gonna be as naked as I am!
Hah! Looks like you didn't win this round, ~name~!
Getting closer to the end! Maybe we can get some crepes later, okay?
... Nice try, but I don't have any blindspots. I use my powers to have a radar running at all times.
So, ~kora~, what are you? You have that computer in your chest, and tones of power radiating from you. Did someone create you from scratch, or were you augmented?
Not a great hand, ~player~? I better make sure that doesn't happen to me!
It'll probably be me who has to strip next round, ~player~. It is kinda based on luck, after all.
Maybe I'll let you in on my poker tricks after this, ~player~!
It's all part of the game, ~player~!
Yeah! I got this round! There's nothing like a bit of friendly competition, ~player~!
It's not looking good for you, eh ~player~?
Ya know... It's not too bad once you get in to it!
Ooooh... I'm kinda interested in seeing what ~player~'s gonna do here!
At least you're still in the game, ~player~!
I bet we'd make great friends, ~player~! Going ahead and stripping in front of others takes guts. I like that!
Us girls can show the boys how it's done, ~player~!
Hey, ~name~, let's both be in our underwear, okay?
We'll both be naked soon, ~player~.
